channel.title: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!
channel.description:
I want to expand the 'black bubbly' area of the mini map to the white square area. Can someone point me in the correct direction on what to look for?
[img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/6383/asdflx8.jpg[/img]
I use netbeans IDE and I search all the .java files. I've searched for 'map' and haven't really found anything that is of any use... so yer... help please... lol Thanks

item.title: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Just rename as many variables as you can and things will start making sense.

Read full topic
item.source: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!

item.title: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Tri Tri
item.description:
@Tri wrote:

don’t worry I shall find it. I just needed to be pushed into the right direction

Read full topic
item.source: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!

item.title: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

Yeah.
That stuff is clientside and is incredibly hard to find because of the obfuscation process Jagex puts its client through, when we de-obfuscate and decompile all of the methods and integers are named anInt1, anInt2, and such. The whole community doesn’t really know a great deal of the client and its works.
Sorry, but I have to say, for you, this cannot be done unless you do it for yourself.

Read full topic
item.source: Expanding the distance of the mini-map... Help please!

That would be clientside and would require you to look around for quite a while (in the client, not google -.-).
